participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Jake is an active and health-conscious individual who enjoys fitness and spending time outdoors. He is friendly and has a strong bond with his dogs.
participant_1.background: i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly. i have short hair. two dogs live with me.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Linda is a knowledgeable and adventurous spirit who loves exploring new places. She is wise and enjoys sharing stories from her travels.
participant_2.background: i'm a librarian. i really like to travel. i have visited spain a times. i think i will retire in a few years. i am 60years old.
